result.execSummary:
The defendant D'Angelo D. Burchfield was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse, Repeater], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes:
Obey all of the rules and regulations of supervising probation agent.  Pay supervision fees. 
** Pay all court costs including all applicable surcharges. 
** Pay DNA surcharges(s).
 If unpaid financial obligations remain at discharge or revocation, civil judgment to be entered.  May Not have contact with Jericka P.  DOC shall promptly notify the court of any new arrest or criminal charge made against the deft.

from Agent Priscella Macias - violations of deft; DOC pursuing revocation

Minutes:  Clerk/T. Lehman.  ADA Krejcarek appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in person w/Atty Cassi Baumgardner.  Case brought to court due to violation of deft.  Defense reports the deft served a sanction of 99 days in custody due to the violation/new charge will has now been resolved.  Deft admonished about his behavior; no further court action taken.

Conditions of Probation Imposed by the Judge

Minutes:  Clerk/T. Lema.  Special Pros K R Wells appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in custody w/Atty Jeremy Chavez.  Case is resolved.  Deft pleads guilty; found guilty by the Court.  Admits to repeater.  Sentencing arguments made.  Sentence w/held; placed on probation for 18mos.  See conditions.
No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.

123pm  Attorney Tracey Braun appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Rocco Defilippis.  Clerk: LE  Not Guilty Plea entered by the Court. Defendant requests Jury Trial. DA Pretrial set for 2/13/15 @ 140pm & Judicial Pretrial set for 3/12/15 @ 140pm & Jury Selection set for 3/30/15 @ 9am.  $1000 Signature Bond Set w/conditions (see bond event).  kmk
